EnableViewmodelHands.title: Enable Viewmodel Hands
EnableViewmodelHands.tooltip: Adds a hand to every item and tool so that they aren't just floating in front of the camera! Recommended: Enabled

EnableViewBob.title: Enable View Bobbing
EnableViewBob.tooltip: Enable the bobbing of the camera while moving.

ViewBobX.title: View Bob X Amount
ViewBobX.tooltip: How much the camera bobs from side to side. Recommended: 1

ViewBobY.title: View Bob Y Amount
ViewBobY.tooltip: How much the camera bobs up and down. Recommended: 1

ViewBobRoll.title: View Bob Roll Amount
ViewBobRoll.tooltip: How much the camera should roll from side to side while moving. Recommended: 1

ViewBobPitch.title: View Bob Pitch Amount
ViewBobPitch.tooltip: How much the camera should rotate up and down while moving. Recommended: 1

EnableToolBob.title: Enable Tool Bobbing
EnableToolBob.tooltip: Enable the bobbing of the held item while moving.

ToolBobX.title: Tool Bob X Amount
ToolBobX.tooltip: How much your held item bobs from side to side. Recommended: 1

ToolBobY.title: Tool Bob Y Amount
ToolBobY.tooltip: How much your held item bobs up and down. Recommended: 1

ToolBobZ.title: Tool Bob Z Amount
ToolBobZ.tooltip: How much your held item bobs forward and backward. Recommended: 1

ToolBobRoll.title: Tool Bob Roll Amount
ToolBobRoll.tooltip: How much your held item should roll from side to side while moving. Recommended: 1

ToolBobPitch.title: Tool Bob Pitch Amount
ToolBobPitch.tooltip: How much your held item should rotate up and down while moving. Recommended: 1

EnableToolSway.title: Tool Sway Behavior
EnableToolSway.tooltip: When enabled, your held item will lag behind the camera a bit as you look around.

ToolSwayTranslateAmount.title: Tool Sway Translational Amount
ToolSwayTranslateAmount.tooltip: How much the tool moves for a given mouse input. Recommended: 1

ToolSwayRotateAmount.title: Tool Sway Rotational Amount
ToolSwayRotateAmount.tooltip: How much the tool rotates for a given mouse input. Recommended: 0

ToolSwaySmoothing.title: Tool Sway Smoothing Amount
ToolSwaySmoothing.tooltip: How smoothly the held item moves back to its normal position. Recommended: 1

ToolHeightBehavior.title: Dynamic Tool Grip Behavior
ToolHeightBehavior.tooltip: Default: The tool will be held further away when looking down and closer when looking up. Legacy: the tool will be held at the normal distance when looking directly forward and closer when looking up or down. Recommended: Default

ToolHeightY.title: Dynamic Tool Grip Y Amount
ToolHeightY.tooltip: How much your held item moves up/down as the player looks up/down. Recommended: 1

ToolHeightZ.title: Dynamic Tool Grip Z Amount
ToolHeightZ.tooltip: How much your held item moves forward/backward as the player looks up/down. Recommended: 1

UseJumpAnim.title: Use Jumping Animation
UseJumpAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera shake a bit when you jump, based on the view/tool bob amounts you set above. Recommended: Enabled

UseFallAnim.title: Use Falling Animation
UseFallAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera sway a bit as you fall, based on the view/tool bob amounts you set above. Recommended: Enabled

UseLandingAnim.title: Use Landing Animation
UseLandingAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera shake a bit when you land on the ground, based on the view/tool bob amounts you set above. Recommended: Enabled

UseScoutAnim.title: Use Scout Launcher Fire Animation
UseScoutAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera and scout launcher recoil when you launch a scout. Recommended: Enabled

HideStowedItems.title: Hide Stowed Items
HideStowedItems.tooltip: Makes held items disappear when they go into the stowed position (i.e. if you start using another tool or roasting a marshmallow while holding an item).
